Package org.team2.cluk.backend.webresources

Class Warehouse

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.team2.cluk.backend.webresources.Warehouse
  • @Path("/warehouse")
public class Warehouse
extends java.lang.Object
    Warehouse Class which handles stocks information, sending orders to restaurant and assigning a driver to deliver the order
    Version:
    11/05/2019

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response approveOrder​(java.lang.String idToken, java.lang.String _orderId)

      javax.ws.rs.core.Response declineOrder​(java.lang.String idToken, java.lang.String _orderId)
      method to decline order.
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getCurrentPendingOrders​(java.lang.String idToken)
      method to get the currently pending orders to go from a warehouse to a restaurant Includes the date and time for the orders
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getMinStock​(java.lang.String idToken, java.lang.String address)
      Method which gets the minimum amount of each stock item within the warehouse If successful, system will show "Stock Item: "+stockItem+" Current minimum stock level: "+minQuantity If unsuccessful, system will show "ERROR_QUERYING_MIN_STOCK_LEVEL"
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response GetStockNames​(java.lang.String idToken)
      method to get the stock names
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response GetTotalStock​(java.lang.String idToken, java.lang.String address)
      Method which gets the total stock within a warehouse If successful, system will show "StockItem: " + Quantity
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getWarehouseList​(java.lang.String idToken)
      method to get a warehouse list
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response minStockCheck​(java.lang.String idToken, java.lang.String address)
      Method which checks that the Warehouse stock is above the minimum quantity level If method is successful and there are stock items below the minimum level, system will show "Current stock of "+ stockItem +" is below minimum stock levels by "+ deficit If method is successful and no stock items are below the minimum level, system will show "ENOUGH_STOCK"
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response sendOrder​(java.lang.String idToken, java.lang.String address, java.lang.String _orderId)
      Method which sends an order from a Warehouse to a Restaurant It reduces warehouse stock levels determined by the stock requests in the order, taking the order ID as a parameter The system checks whether the order has enough stock quantities to provide the order If successful, the system shows "ORDER_SENT" If unsuccessful due to not enough stock in warehouse, the system shows "STOCK_TOO_LOW"
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateMinStock​(java.lang.String idToken, java.lang.String address, java.lang.String requestBody)
      Method which allows the Warehouse stock minimum levels to be set If successful, the system will show "MIN_STOCK_VALUE_UPDATED" If unsuccessful request, the system will show "REQUEST_MISSPECIFIED"
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateStock​(java.lang.String idToken, java.lang.String address, java.lang.String requestBody)
      Method to increase the warehouse stock by the quantity specified Takes parameters of stock item and quantity {stockItem: string, quantity: number} If successful, system shows "STOCK_UPDATED" If JSON request unsuccessful, system shows "Order entry misspecified.
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response warehouseGraph​(java.lang.String idToken, java.lang.String stockItem, java.lang.String type)
      method that outputs data to plot graphs for stock sent by warehouse

      • GetStockNames

        @GET
@Path("/get-stock-names")
@Produces("application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response GetStockNames​(@HeaderParam("Authorization")
                                               java.lang.String idToken)
        method to get the stock names
        Parameters:
        idToken - to check access for warehouse
        Returns:
        all stock within the warehouse

      • GetTotalStock

        @GET
@Path("/get-total-stock")
@Produces("application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response GetTotalStock​(@HeaderParam("Authorization")
                                               java.lang.String idToken,
                                               @HeaderParam("address")
                                               java.lang.String address)
        Method which gets the total stock within a warehouse If successful, system will show "StockItem: " + Quantity
        Parameters:
        address - of the warehouse
        idToken - to check access for warehouse
        Returns:
        the stock name and quantity (in units) held at the warehouse

      • updateStock

        @POST
@Path("/update-stock")
@Consumes("application/json")
@Produces("application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateStock​(@HeaderParam("Authorization")
                                             java.lang.String idToken,
                                             @HeaderParam("address")
                                             java.lang.String address,
                                             java.lang.String requestBody)
        Method to increase the warehouse stock by the quantity specified Takes parameters of stock item and quantity {stockItem: string, quantity: number} If successful, system shows "STOCK_UPDATED" If JSON request unsuccessful, system shows "Order entry misspecified. Skipping entry."
        Parameters:
        idToken - to check access for warehouse
        address - of the warehouse
        requestBody - uses Json to request an array of the stock at the warehouse
        Returns:
        the updated stock to the warehouse

@Path("/approve-order")

public javax.ws.rs.core.Response approveOrder​(@HeaderParam("Authorization")

                                              @HeaderParam("orderId")
                                              java.lang.String _orderId)
        method to approve order from the warehouse to the restaurant

        idToken - to check access to warehouse and restaurant
        _orderId - of the stock order
        Returns:
        approved order

      • sendOrder

        @GET
@Path("/send-order")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response sendOrder​(@HeaderParam("Authorization")
                                           java.lang.String idToken,
                                           @HeaderParam("address")
                                           java.lang.String address,
                                           @HeaderParam("orderId")
                                           java.lang.String _orderId)
        Method which sends an order from a Warehouse to a Restaurant It reduces warehouse stock levels determined by the stock requests in the order, taking the order ID as a parameter The system checks whether the order has enough stock quantities to provide the order If successful, the system shows "ORDER_SENT" If unsuccessful due to not enough stock in warehouse, the system shows "STOCK_TOO_LOW"
        Parameters:
        idToken - to check access for warehouse
        address - of the warehouse
        _orderId - including the stock items and quantity which are to be sent
        Returns:
        database update showing the order is out for delivery

      • getMinStock

        @Path("/get-min-stock")
@GET
@Consumes("application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getMinStock​(@HeaderParam("Authorization")
                                             java.lang.String idToken,
                                             @HeaderParam("address")
                                             java.lang.String address)
        Method which gets the minimum amount of each stock item within the warehouse If successful, system will show "Stock Item: "+stockItem+" Current minimum stock level: "+minQuantity If unsuccessful, system will show "ERROR_QUERYING_MIN_STOCK_LEVEL"
        Parameters:
        idToken - to check access for warehouse
        address - of the warehouse
        Returns:
        the stock items and their minimum amount

      • minStockCheck

        @GET
@Path("/min-stock-check")
@Produces("application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response minStockCheck​(@HeaderParam("Authorization")
                                               java.lang.String idToken,
                                               @HeaderParam("address")
                                               java.lang.String address)
        Method which checks that the Warehouse stock is above the minimum quantity level If method is successful and there are stock items below the minimum level, system will show "Current stock of "+ stockItem +" is below minimum stock levels by "+ deficit If method is successful and no stock items are below the minimum level, system will show "ENOUGH_STOCK"
        Parameters:
        idToken - to check access for warehouse
        address - of the warehouse
        Returns:
        a list of stock and quantity which is below the minimum level for that warehouse

      • updateMinStock

        @Path("/update-min-stock")
@POST
@Consumes("application/json")
@Produces("application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateMinStock​(@HeaderParam("Authorization")
                                                java.lang.String idToken,
                                                @HeaderParam("address")
                                                java.lang.String address,
                                                java.lang.String requestBody)
        Method which allows the Warehouse stock minimum levels to be set If successful, the system will show "MIN_STOCK_VALUE_UPDATED" If unsuccessful request, the system will show "REQUEST_MISSPECIFIED"
        Parameters:
        idToken - to check access for warehouse
        address - of the Warehouse
        requestBody - to request to update stock minimum levels
        Returns:
        adding the updated minimum stock levels to the database

                                                         java.lang.String idToken)
        method to get the currently pending orders to go from a warehouse to a restaurant Includes the date and time for the orders
        Parameters:
        idToken - to check access for warehouse
        Returns:
        order entries which currently have the status "pending"

      • warehouseGraph

        @GET
@Path("/warehouse-graph")
@Produces("application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response warehouseGraph​(@HeaderParam("Authorization")
                                                java.lang.String idToken,
                                                @HeaderParam("stockItem")
                                                java.lang.String stockItem,
                                                @HeaderParam("type")
                                                java.lang.String type)
        method that outputs data to plot graphs for stock sent by warehouse
        Parameters:
        idToken - to check access for the warehouse
        stockItem - which is then plotted on graph
        type - time interval to use for the plot
        Returns:
        data to plot graphs
